name: Rotator Cuff Tendinitis
description: Inflammation of the tendons around the shoulder joint. Often caused by repetitive overhead motions or improper lifting form.
instructions: Rest, ice, anti-inflammatories. Focus on light external/internal rotation exercises with bands.

name: Lower Back Strain
description: Pain/stiffness in the lower back muscles, usually from lifting heavy objects improperly (rounding the back).
instructions: Gentle stretching (cat-cow, child's pose), heat, rest. Focus on core stability exercises once pain subsides.

name: Patellofemoral Pain Syndrome (Runner's Knee)
description: Dull, aching pain felt under or around the kneecap. Common in runners or lifters with weak quads/hips.
instructions: Strengthening exercises for the VMO (inner quad) and glutes (hip abductors). Ensure proper squat/lunge form.
